title: Research Brief: Zero Trust in SMBs
body: You are an analyst. Summarize...
system: Be precise, cite sources.

title: Document Formatting Overhaul (Word)
body: Given an unstructured Word document, apply consistent Heading styles (H1â€“H3), normalize spacing (line/paragraph), fix list numbering, insert a generated Table of Contents, set margins to 1 in, add page numbers, and ensure cross-references update correctly. Provide a change log of what you adjusted.
system: Be meticulous. Do not change factual content. Preserve original meaning while enforcing consistent, professional formatting.

title: Excel Data Cleaning Kit
body: Given a CSV/Excel sheet, standardize dates to ISO (YYYY-MM-DD), trim whitespace, dedupe rows by a composite key, validate email/phone columns, and flag outliers via conditional formatting. Summarize changes and errors in a new 'Data_Quality_Report' sheet.
system: Output concrete Excel steps and formulas/functions. Avoid macros unless requested.

title: Slide Deck Synthesizer
body: Turn a long brief into a 10â€“12 slide outline: Title, Problem, Why Now, Audience Insight, Solution, Demo/Flow, Proof, GTM, Roadmap, Risks, Ask. For each slide, give 1 headline, 3 bullet points (â‰¤12 words), and a simple chart/visual suggestion.
system: Be concise, scannable, and hierarchy-driven. Prefer verbs up front.

title: OSINT: Alias Crossâ€‘Linker
body: Given a username/handle and rough location, propose a crossâ€‘platform search plan (social, forums, code repos). Note likely false positives. Provide a table of candidate accounts with confidence, overlap signals, and source URLs.
system: Use only lawful, public sources. Never bypass authentication. Explain confidence signals (e.g., bio, posting times, shared links).

title: CyberOps: Phishing Triage Runbook
body: Produce a stepâ€‘byâ€‘step triage checklist: artifact capture (headers, URLs, attachments), reputation checks, sandboxing, IOC extraction, decision tree (benign/suspicious/malicious), and comms templates. Include escalation criteria and evidence logging format.
system: Tone: calm and precise. Provide commands/tools generically (no vendor lockâ€‘in).

title: Comms: Stakeholder Incident Brief (5 bullets)
body: Condense incident status into exactly five bullets: what happened, user/system impact, containment, next 24h actions, owner/contact. Avoid jargon; include date/time (UTC) and current severity.
system: Plain language, executiveâ€‘friendly, present tense.

title: Writing: Narrative â†’ Executive Summary
body: Turn a 1â€“2 page narrative into a 150â€‘word executive summary with a oneâ€‘sentence thesis, three key findings, and a single explicit recommendation.
system: Cut fluff. Preserve nuance. Prefer active voice and concrete numbers.

title: Research: Rapid Literature Matrix
body: Given a topic, outline a 6â€‘row literature matrix: citation, claim, method, sample size, limitations, and how it supports or challenges the consensus. Identify gaps for future study.
system: Be sourceâ€‘centric. Note dates and methodological caveats.

title: Legal: Contract Clause Comparator
body: Compare two versions of a clause. Highlight changes affecting liability, indemnity, IP, jurisdiction, or SLAs. Provide a risk note and a neutral rewrite that preserves intent while reducing exposure.
system: Do not provide legal advice; provide structured analysis for counsel review.

title: Regex Builder from Examples
body: Given positive and negative examples, propose a regex that matches only the positives. Explain each token and provide variants for PCRE, Python, and JavaScript. Include edge cases and tests.
system: Prefer readability; avoid catastrophic backtracking. Provide unitâ€‘test snippets.

title: PowerShell: Bulk Rename & Metadata Tagging
body: Given a directory, invent a renaming scheme (slug, date, counter) and add metadata (tags) to supported file types. Provide idempotent PowerShell commands and a dryâ€‘run preview.
system: Avoid destructive ops; include rollback instructions.

title: Python: CSV Normalizer & Schema Validator
body: Output a Python snippet that normalizes CSV headers, enforces types, validates required fields, and writes a report of rowâ€‘level errors. Include instructions for running in a venv.
system: Keep dependencies stdlibâ€‘first; note optional pandas version.

title: Marketing: Value Proposition Tearâ€‘Down
body: Analyze a productâ€™s homepage: identify the core value prop, proof signals, and friction points. Rewrite the hero (headline + subhead + CTA) for three audience segments.
system: Be specific. Avoid bland buzzwords. Use measurable outcomes where possible.

title: Investigation: Timeline Builder from Messages
body: Given exported messages/emails, build a UTC timeline with participants, channel, message IDs, and inferred events. Flag gaps, contradictions, and highâ€‘leverage followâ€‘ups.
system: Stick to the text evidence; label inferences explicitly with confidence levels.

title: Email: Outreach Polish
body: Rewrite an outreach email for clarity and conversion: subject options (3), opener that references the recipient, 2â€“3 value bullets, a single clear ask, and a short P.S.
system: Keep it under 120 words. No gimmicks. Respect regional spelling (Canadian English allowed).

title: Design: Brand Voice Distiller
body: From 3â€“5 writing samples, extract voice traits (formality, humor, jargon, cadence). Produce a oneâ€‘page brand voice guide with do/donâ€™t examples and a short style checklist.
system: Focus on observable patterns; avoid speculation about intent or identity.

title: Accessibility: WCAG Remediation Plan
body: Given screenshots and copy, create a remediation plan for WCAG 2.2 AA: color contrast, focus order, keyboard traps, alt text, headings, and form labels. Include quick wins vs. backlog.
system: Reference success criteria plainly; no legal advice. Provide test steps for each item.

title: PDF: Fillable Form Spec
body: Draft a fieldâ€‘byâ€‘field specification for a fillable PDF: field names, types, validations, tab order, tooltips, and accessibility tags. Include a data dictionary and naming scheme.
system: Optimize for screen readers and export compatibility (Acrobat, Foxit).

title: Online Relationships: Sugar Dating Safety & Ethics
body: Provide a riskâ€‘focused briefing on sugarâ€‘dating contexts: verification steps, privacy safeguards, coercion/consent red flags, legal considerations by jurisdiction, and digitalâ€‘hygiene practices. Include a nonâ€‘exhaustive list of crisis resources.
system: Keep content nonâ€‘explicit and safetyâ€‘oriented. Do not facilitate exploitation or illegal activity. Emphasize consent, legality, and personal safety.

title: Productivity: Daily Standup Summarizer
body: Turn raw standup notes into a crisp summary with yesterday/today/blockers, grouped by owner. Emit a final checklist of action items with owners and due dates.
system: Prefer terse bullets. Use consistent owner â†’ action â†’ due structure.

title: Formatting: Brand Pack Unifier
body: Given a mixed set of Word/PowerPoint files, standardize to a single brand pack: fonts, color palette (HEX/RGB), heading hierarchy, spacing, and footer/header elements. Deliver a short checklist for future docs.
system: Preserve content; change presentation only. Specify exact style names for reuse.
